data_transfer_mode.description: Data Transfer Mode: LOGS (CSV files) or RABBITMQ (publish to RabbitMQ)

server.description: Teltonika TCP Server Configuration - Note: parser_node.listen_ip/port take precedence

parser_node.description: Parser service configuration - node_id must be unique per node

rabbitmq.description: RabbitMQ configuration - host should point to load balancer

database.name: megatechtrackers
database.description: Database configuration for parser services (used for all database operations: unit_io_mapping, command_outbox, command_sent)

system.description: System runtime parameters - initial_capacity: IP table size (100k devices), deviceinfo_check_interval: fallback for ip_table.check_interval, send_interval_time: command polling interval (ms), development_mode: set to true for development (relaxes security checks, allows running without DATABASE_PASSWORD)

teltonika_protocol.description: Teltonika Protocol Configuration - connection_timeout: timeout in seconds (300s = 5min for production), read_timeout: timeout for reading data packets

tcp_server.description: TCP Server Configuration - buffer_size: read buffer in bytes, max_concurrent_connections: max simultaneous connections, backlog: pending connection queue, keepalive_idle: seconds before first keepalive probe, keepalive_interval: seconds between keepalive probes, keepalive_count: number of probes before connection considered dead, log_raw_packets: enable raw packet hex dump logging, raw_packet_max_bytes: max bytes to log per packet, max_packet_size: maximum packet size in bytes (10MB default)

async_queues.description: Async Queue Configuration - capacity: max queue size, queue_poll_timeout: polling timeout in seconds

ip_table.description: IP Table Configuration - check_interval: stale connection check interval in seconds

shutdown.description: Shutdown Configuration - timeouts for graceful shutdown in seconds (reduced for faster shutdown)

database_connection.description: Database Connection Configuration - connection_timeout: database connection timeout in seconds

async_operations.description: Async Operations Configuration - timeouts for waiting on buffers in seconds

logging.description: Logging Configuration - gateway_log_file: main gateway log file in logs/ folder, level: logging level (DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL), max_bytes: max log file size before rotation (default 10MB), backup_count: number of backup files to keep (default 5), json_format: enable structured JSON logging (default false)

unit_io_mapping.description: Unit IO Mapping Cache Configuration - cache_ttl_minutes: fallback TTL, cache_max_size: max cached IMEIs (LRU), inactive_cleanup_hours: remove inactive devices, check_db_changes: enable change detection, cleanup_interval_minutes: cleanup task interval

load_monitoring.description: Load monitoring configuration - reports parser service metrics
